abstract: Merrill Lynch‘s deal to be bought by Bank of America is not expected to affect the $500 million line of credit the bank extended to United Artists, the film studio run by Tom Cruise, The New York Post reported.
lead_paragraph: Merrill Lynch‘s deal to be bought by Bank of America is not expected to affect the $500 million line of credit the bank extended to United Artists, the film studio run by Tom Cruise, The New York Post reported.

headline.main: United Artists to Keep Credit Line at Merrill, Report Says
